amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical corrections and requires a GAO report on state and municipal spaceports in the existing indemnification regime.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to make technical corrections and requires a GAO report on state and municipal spaceports in the existing indemnification regime.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Smith (TX).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
